patternsEstablished: dict[str, Any] for all unparameterized dicts
type: ignore[attr-defined] for SDK imports without __all__

decisionsLog.decision: Use dict[str, Any] not TypedDict for model_dump() outputs and metadata dicts
decisionsLog.reason: Accurate typing without premature TypedDict definitions â€” stronger typing deferred to dedicated specs

decisionsLog.decision: type: ignore[attr-defined] for voyageai.Client, not a type stub
decisionsLog.reason: Minimal maintenance burden, voyageai may publish stubs later
